title: Verb collection 1
sentences: What time does the movie start at the cinema?
un regalo para el cumpleaños de mi madre.
Tomorrow I'm buying a gift for my mother's birthday.
Can you open the window? It's very hot.
I always have coffee with milk and bread for breakfast.
en un apartamento cerca de la playa.
My friends live in an apartment near the beach.
What do you do in your free time?
español porque quiere viajar a Madrid.
She is learning Spanish because she wants to travel to Madrid.
I can't find my passport anywhere.
Do you want to have dinner with me at that new restaurant?
muy despacio cuando hay mucha lluvia.
He drives very slowly when there is a lot of rain.
Can you help me with these very heavy suitcases?
We wait for the bus at the stop.
Do you know how to cook Valencian paella?
They listen to music while they study.
What time are you coming back home today?
detrás de la pelota en el jardín.
My dog runs after the ball in the garden.
Can you repeat the question, please?
Today I finish my work earlier.
Where do you put the keys when you arrive?
She looks at the photos of her vacation.
Why are you calling so late on the phone?
por el parque todas las mañanas.
We walk through the park every morning.
What are you drinking? Water or juice?
un mensaje de texto a su novia.
He writes a text message to his girlfriend.
When are you traveling to Mexico?
dictionary:
Empieza - It starts
Compra - He/she buys
Abrir - To open
Cerrar - To close
Vivir - To live
Hacer - To do/make
Aprender - To learn
Encontrar - To find
Cenar - To have dinner
Ayudar - To help
